title.en: Hired worker consumes fuel and seeds
title.de: Hired worker consumes fuel and seeds

description.en:
Makes hired workers NOT auto-magically refill. The hired workers will stop, if sowingmachine becomes empty, or fuel-level goes below 1%.
Decker_MMIV - fs-uk.com, forum.farming-simulator.com, modhoster.com
description.de:
Makes hired workers NOT automatically refill. The hired workers will stop, if sowingmachine becomes empty, or fuel-level goes below 1%.
